title: Elon Musk: Apple car 'obvious' and 'an open secret' | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Musk]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * On the wider topic of automated vehicles, Musk claimed that in a decade or soit would be unusual to buy a car that wasn’t capable of driving itself. Hesaid that owning a traditional car would become like owning and riding a horse– something you do for sentimental rather than practical reasons.Musk also claimed to be surprised that two of his three major ventures – Teslaand private space travel company SpaceX – were still running. At the outset,he only gave both companies a 10 percent chance of succeeding.(apester:56671355b8db3ddc5ef5c366)What do you think about Musk’s comment’s against Apple? Let us know below.
